name: Empty Tags Remover
author: Dan - Lucian Stefancu

sections.description: Empty Tags Remover adds a page called ‘Remove empty tags’ under ‘Posts’ admin menu where you can simply remove all the empty tags with just one click.
sections.installation:
Instructions for installing the Empty Tags Remover plugin.

  1. Download the plugin and unzip it to a folder on your computer.
  2. Upload empty-tags-remover folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate ‘Empty Tags Remover’ plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Find the page called ‘Remove empty tags’ under ‘Posts’ admin menu and remover the trash ðŸ™‚

short_description: Removes the empty tags, tags with no posts attached.
description: Empty Tags Remover adds a page called ‘Remove empty tags’ under ‘Posts’ admin menu where you can simply remove all the empty tags with just one click.
